name: Dalye ka Halwa Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Dalye ka Halwa Recipe: Dalya crushed 250 gms soaked for 4 hours Ghee ¼ cup heaved Sugar ¾ cup Green cardamom 5 whole coarsely grounded Coconut sliced 2 tbsp Raisins 2 tbsp Water 2 ½ cups
instructions: Heat ghee, add green cardamom with dalya. Fry well. Add 2½ cups of water. Simmer on low flame until tender. Add sugar, coconut and mix well. Leave it on dum for 10 mins. Serve with malai or milk.
